reasoning: MBL deficiency measured as prevalence of genetic variant. Genetic deficiency affects 5-10% of global population, higher in some regions. However, most affected individuals are asymptomatic and do not have increased infection risk due to immune redundancy.
source: Eisen DP et al. (2008). Mannose-binding lectin deficiency and invasive pneumococcal disease. Lancet Infect Dis. 8(5):299-306
